list.name: Changes
list.comment: added link for user manual to home.html

task.summary: Updated main.py by removing the static image folder that we do not need.
Updated main.py by removing the static image folder that we do not need.
Updated main.py by removing the static image folder that we do not need.
Removed an unnecessary comment and an import statement that was not needed.

I moved KeyWeb.html to the templates folder. I altered random.html to have the shopping cart feature added. However, there still exists problems with the CSS. I also was trying to update the keyweb.html with the shopping cart features but there are lots of coding logic that doesn't make sense. Will try to notify Aidan about this

There were a couple of issues that I have found with the buttons. Particularly, no response/not highlighting. I added the necessary features to make them consistent. Additionally, I have found bugs with the buttons where it would refresh the page but have nothing on it. I fixed the submit button and modified the add to cart buttons, but I have yet to find a more efficient solution for the others.

Made edits to KeyWeb.html to allow for a functional shopping feature. The bug that was referenced in the activity report in KeyWeb.html was that every time I went back, the cache was cleared. I just changed the button to avoid that issue
Made changes to Augustus's edits on KeyWeb.html to match the consistent design aesthetics.
Created the html template for the user manual, which has the working navigation buttons and consistent aesthetics and design.
Updated random.html to have the complete features of the shopping cart (add to cart and cart button). I also removed the user manual page as discussed in meeting.
Added user manual link to home.html
added link for user manual to home.html
